content.text:
# Lifetime Achievement Award in Translation

China
| description = One of the most prestigious translation prizes in China, recognizing lifetime contributions to translation culture.
}}
The Lifetime Achievement Award in Translation (), awarded by the Translators Association of China (TAC) since 2006, is one of the most prestigious translation prizes in China.
List of recipients
